site.name: Honest Pharm Co.
site.description: Licensed New York State cannabis cultivator providing premium flower, concentrates, and edibles to dispensaries statewide. Wholesale B2B platform for licensed retailers.

home.title: Honest Pharm Co. - Premium New York Cannabis Cultivator
home.metaDescription: Licensed NY State cannabis cultivator providing premium flower, concentrates & edibles. Wholesale B2B platform for licensed dispensaries. Lab-tested, sustainably grown.

about.title: Growing Excellence Since 2021
about.content: Honest Pharm Co. is a vertically integrated cannabis company focused on cultivation and wholesale distribution. Our state-of-the-art facility produces premium flower, concentrates, and edibles for New York's licensed dispensaries.

features.title: Premium Genetics
features.description: Carefully selected strains for optimal effects and terpene profiles

features.title: Lab Tested
features.description: Third-party tested for potency, pesticides, and contaminants

features.title: Statewide Delivery
features.description: Reliable distribution to dispensaries across New York State

features.title: Fully Licensed
features.description: OCM licensed cultivator and distributor in compliance with NY regulations

catalog.title: Product Catalog - Honest Pharm Co.
catalog.metaDescription: Browse our premium cannabis product catalog. Wholesale flower, concentrates, and edibles for NY dispensaries. Competitive pricing and bulk ordering available.

login.title: Login - Honest Pharm Co.
login.metaDescription: Login to your Honest Pharm Co. wholesale account. Access exclusive B2B pricing and place orders for your dispensary.

register.title: Register - Honest Pharm Co.
register.metaDescription: Register for a wholesale account with Honest Pharm Co. Get access to B2B pricing and ordering for licensed NY dispensaries.

featured.name: Purple Haze
featured.description: Classic sativa with uplifting effects and sweet berry aroma

featured.name: OG Kush
featured.description: Legendary indica with powerful relaxation and pine notes

featured.name: Blue Dream
featured.description: Balanced hybrid with full-body relaxation and gentle cerebral invigoration

legal.ageVerification: You must be 21 years or older to access this site.
legal.disclaimer: For licensed dispensaries only. All products are for wholesale distribution to OCM-licensed retailers.
